mocha-better-spec-reporter
==========================

Just a fork of mocha spec reporter, but with small goodies


How to use
=======


```
npm install --save-dev mocha-better-spec-reporter
```

```
mocha --reporter mocha-better-spec-reporter ... # and other options there
```
